item.title: Lyricall Architecture
item.description: Architecture of lyricall.net Table of Contents tl;dr [App Overview]() [Front End]() [TypeScript]() [Redux]() [React]() [Back End]() [Database - PostgresQL]() [Why Postgres]() [Database Schema]() [Lyricall Tables]() [Straggler Tables]() [ASP.NET / Entity Framework Tables]() [Server - .NET Core 2.0 / ASP.NET Core 2.0]() [Why .NET Core]() [Intermission - the DotNetStandardSpotifyWebApi library]() [Intermission - the ASP.NET.Security.OAuth Project]() [Server Architecture]() [Hosting]() [Digital Ocean]() [Microsoft Azure]() [HTTPS with Let’s Encrypt]() Technology tl;dr: Front End * React * Redux * TypeScript
